description: This file contains the parameters for the experiments in the paper. The data is a subset of the Argoverse 1.0 tracking dataset.

1d676737-4110-3f7e-bec0-0c90f74c248f.comment: This scenario contains multiple traffic lights that are all the same color (green). For simplicity we are combining these together as 1 long road with a single green light.

64c12551-adb9-36e3-a0c1-e43a0e9f3845.comment: Our token example. The light is completely obscured by glare from the sun.

70d2aea5-dbeb-333d-b21e-76a7f2f1ba1c.comment: A complex Y shaped 5 way intersection. We have simply listed no cars and run the scenario anyway. This is to demonstrate that our model collapses to an HMM in the absence of relevant cars.

84c35ea7-1a99-3a0c-a3ea-c5915d68acbc.comment: Large traffic jam in Miami, only 1 car in our lane.

b1ca08f1-24b0-3c39-ba4e-d5a92868462c.comment: Example of performance with many cars. We are doing inference on 10 in this example.

10b3a1d8-e56c-38be-aaf7-ef2f862a5c4e.comment: Simple red to green in miami.

577ea60d-7cc0-34a4-a8ff-0401e5ab9c62.comment: Green with a traffic jam in Miami. All impacted except 4 & 9. [1, 4, 9, 10, 15, 19] could be used.

88538208_8853_8853_8853_388539396096.comment: Red to green, Pittsburgh at night.

aeb73d7a-8257-3225-972e-99307b3a5cb0.comment: Two greens in Miami, combined for simplicity again.

ebe7a98b-d383-343b-96d6-9e681e2c6a36.comment: Simple red to green in Pittsburgh, the car ahead is creeping while red.

fa0b626f-03df-35a0-8447-021088814b8b.comment: Interesting red to green in Pittsburgh where we get cut off by a parked car (5).

fb471bd6-7c81-3d93-ad12-ac54a28beb84.comment: Simple red (1 frame) to green in Pittsburgh

02cf0ce1-699a-373b-86c0-eb6fd5f4697a.comment: Red to green in Pittsburgh, rain drops on the camera lens.

08a8b7f0-c317-3bdb-b3dc-b7c9b6d033e2.comment: Green straight through in Pittsburgh, only 2 relevant cars though.

9da4ca63-f524-3b38-8c8b-624f17518574.comment: Green with construction in Miami. Bus gets impacted.

49d66e75-3ce6-316b-b589-f659c7ef5e6d.comment: Simple red (1 second) to green Pittsburgh. Forced to skip, broken labels.

52af191b-ba56-326c-b569-e37790db40f3.comment: 1 simple green straight through in Pittsburgh at the start.

919be600-da69-3f09-b0fd-f42f7eb2e097.comment: Red to green Pittsburgh. Force skip, broken labels.

2d12da1d-5238-3870-bfbc-b281d5e8c1a1.comment: Red to green in Pittsburgh, no relevant cars.

7d37fc6b-1028-3f6f-b980-adb5fa73021e.comment: Two lights, both green to start and second turns to yellow and red during traffic. Super interesting example! Again combined into 1 for simplicity.

c6911883-1843-3727-8eaa-41dc8cda8993.comment: Simple example all green in Pittsburgh.
